attributes.action: All MPs to attend the debate if the petition gets 150,000 signatures.
attributes.background: The debate 'make the production, sale and use of cannabis legal' received over 200,000 votes and only 14 our of 650 MP's attended. If a petition gets 100,000 signatures, it will be CONSIDERED for debate. Make it compulsory for all MPs to attend the debate if the petition gets 150,000 signatures.
